item.title: How Gratitude Creates Abundance Consciousness? Ask Deepak Chopra!
item.description:
How Gratitude Creates Abundance Consciousness? Ask Deepak Chopra!

Find our more at http://www.deepakchopra.com/video/view/215/ask_deepak__how_gratitude_creates_abundance_consciosness When you focus on the things that you are grateful for, it opens you to the source of all those things that came into your life. It also removes your ego, which is a nice way of getting touch with your spirit.

item.title: How Can We Live With Least Effort? Ask Deepak Chopra!
item.description:
How Can We Live With Least Effort? Ask Deepak Chopra!

Find out more at https://www.deepakchopra.com/video/view/208/ask_deepak__how_can_we_live_with_least_effort How can we live with least effort? The law of least effort is based on the idea that nature's intelligence functions with effortless spontaneity. Even Jesus mentions this in the New Testament. What is really the law? It means harnessing the forces of the universe and becoming aligned with them.

item.title: What Can Make You Irresistible? Ask Deepak Chopra!
item.description:
What Can Make You Irresistible? Ask Deepak Chopra!

Read more: https://www.deepakchopra.com/video/view/236/what_can_make_you_irresistable? Subscribe to The Chopra Well: http://bit.ly/M5z254 Three ingredients of an irresistible, magnetic, charming person: 1. Presence: You are present in the moment, attentive to what is. Everything about you reflects that. You do not have the luxury to be distracted. This all reflects life-centered, present moment awareness.

item.title: What Are The Seven Principles of Manifesting Your Desires? Ask Deepak Chopra!
item.description:
What Are The Seven Principles of Manifesting Your Desires? Ask Deepak Chopra!

Find out more on Deepak Chopra's official website: https://www.deepakchopra.com/video/view/214/the_seven_principles_of_manifesting_your_desires The seven principles are: See the universe as an extension of yourself Evolve through the mirror of relationship Understand that intention has infinite organizing power Free yourself from emotional turbulence Harness the masculine and the feminine in your own being Never ignore a coincidence Always stay grounded and centered in yourself Follow Deepak on Twitter: https://twitter.com/deepakchopra Follow Deepak on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeepakChopraCommunity

item.title: How Does Forgiveness Heal? Ask Deepak Chopra!
item.description:
How Does Forgiveness Heal? Ask Deepak Chopra!

Find out more at https://www.deepakchopra.com/video/view/212/ask_deepak__how_does_forgiveness_heal Deepak Chopra explains the healing power of forgiveness. When you have a resentment, grievance , feeling of hostility towards someone or if you have any of the other toxic emotions like guilt, shame, depression or fear, these emotions release hormones such as adrenaline and cortisol.

item.title: How to Maximize the Use of Our Time | Ask Deepak Chopra!
item.description:
How to Maximize the Use of Our Time | Ask Deepak Chopra!

Read more: http://bit.ly/S5VW0m Subscribe to The Chopra Well: http://bit.ly/M5z254 Description: How do we maximize the use of our time? Deepak weighs in on this question, so crucial to the way we live our lives in contemporary culture.* He advises that we divide the day into segments of activities - work time, sleep time, exercise time, meditation time, etc.

item.title: Deepak Chopra : Physical Healing, Emotional Wellbeing
item.description:
Deepak Chopra : Physical Healing, Emotional Wellbeing

How we can be liberated from stress, burn out, depression, immune dysfunction, relationship pressures and other emotional and physical illnesses. Deepak Copra is a New York Times Best Selling author, Founder of the Chopra Foundation and a Gallup Senior Scientist. He has written more than 50 books.
